name: Jeron Engineering
overview:
Established in the year 2001 as a sole proprietorship firm, we “Jeron Engineering Works” are a trusted manufacturer and supplier of a comprehensive collection of Caster Bearing, Brackets and Furniture Fittings.

Our Products: Trolley Caster Revolving Sixer Wheel Castor Sixer Wheel Bearing Sixer Wheel Pin Fix Castor Pins L Brackets Furniture Fittings fix caster dalering bearing

Who We Are: Jeron Engineering Works was established in the year 2001 by Mr. Kanak A. Nadar. We have manufacturing setup at Thane, India and our In-house design, planning & manufacturing team restrain expertise to comply quality standards and are dedicated for on time delivery to meet customer requirements with cost effective products.

Our Team: With our industry presence of more than a decade, we have been able to comprehend the importance of skilled professionals in the growth of any organization.

Our Quality: Quality has been core to all our business activities and we ensure that these are executed in compliance with the industry standards. All the products including furniture fittings, brackets and caster bearings are manufactured using high grade material and in compliance with the industry standards.

Our Infrastructure: A state-of-the-art infrastructure at our premise has enabled us to meet the variegated demands of our clients based across the country.

Client Satisfaction: We are a client centric organization and ensure that all our products meet their exact demands. Our professionals are trained to meet the customized demands and to follow ethical practices throughout the production and post production stages.
